"Anan": "Stia's a pretty demanding place, isn't it? It's hot, the enemies are strong..."
"Makes it a pain to secure ingredients for food..."
"Say, have you ever gathered ingredients here in Stia?"
"If you're used to that sorta stuff, I'd like to ask a favor of you."
"I'd like you to gather me some \"Nourishing Stira Hermit Crab\" and some \"Sharp Stira Octopus\"."
"They can both be found in Stia's Fringes."
"Thanks again!"
"Oh, alright... That's too bad."
"Well, come see me later then. Whenever you've got some free time, no rush."
"Can you go get me some \"Nourishing Stira Hermit Crab\" and \"Sharp Stira Octopus\"?"
"I could really use five of each!"
"Hand over the ingredients"
"Cancel"
"Thanks so much! Ooh, each one's lookin' good!"
"With stuff this good, I'm really gonna have try my best to make an equally good menu."
"...You know, there's a lot of troops here who don't seem to be interested in their own diet."
"Everyone's always eating Quick Food or portable meals."
"I mean, that's all well and good if you're out on the field."
"But at least while in the Camp, I want to be able to give people a proper meal, you know?"
"I mean, there's nothing pleasant about a daily life without tasty meals, right?"
"That's why I wanna whip up a tasty menu, so everyone can remember what good food tastes like."
"You don't mind continuing to help me out, right?"
"Ah, you're a bit short... Sorry, can you come back with five of each?"
"I see... Well, come on back when you've got 'em all."
"Hey, you! Got some time?"
"Actually, there's some more ingredients I want you to get for me."
"I'm just missing some ingredients, and then I'll be able to make the perfect dish."
"I'm gonna need \"Nourishing Stira Meat\" and \"Refreshing Stira Meat\"."
"There's a lot of DOLLS and Alters here in Stia, but it also has quite a few Tames if you look in the right areas."
"Alright, thanks again!"
"Ah, I guess you're a little busy..."
"Let me know whenever you've got some time, 'kay?"
"Ah, did you get the \"Nourishing Stira Meat\" and \"Refreshing Stira Meat\"?"
"I could really use five of each!"
"Hand over the ingredients"
"Cancel"
"Thanks so much! I'll be able to bring out a lot of flavors with these."
"Alrighty, first, we start by putting the ingredients into the pan... And then whatever seasoning might seem good..."
"...Hm? What's with that expression? Something wrong with how I cook?"
"...Well, yeah, EATING food has always been more of my forte..."
"Aelio Town always had plenty of ingredients nearby; it was such a great place..."
"The line between \"combat\" and \"logistics\" was less defined, too."
"Everyone fought together, cooked together, and ate together."
"I can't forget those experiences back then, so now I'm here, just tryin' my best, you know?"
"So it's fine if I mess up, 'cause I wanna try all sorts of stuff."
"I'm sure everyone would be happy for me."
"That's why I'm not gonna stop trying."
"Not until the day I make the ultimate dish!"
"Ah, you're a bit short... Sorry, can you come back with five each?"
"I see... Well, come on back when you've got 'em all."
"When I complete my menu, you'll have to come and try some of my food."
"...It might be a biiiit of a rough journey along the way, though..."
"Anyways, look forward to it!"
